-- | haskell supercollider cairo drawing
--   
--   haskell supercollider cairo drawing
@package hsc3-cairo
@version 0.14


-- | Shell
module Sound.SC3.Cairo.Scope.Shell
type Render_F st = Shell st -> st -> Render st
type Interact_F st = UDP -> Shell st -> st -> IO st
type Bracket_F st = (Interact_F st, Interact_F st)
type SC3_F st = Interact_F st
type Key_F st = Char -> st -> st
data Shell st
Shell :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> [[Double]] -> Bracket_F st -> SC3_F st -> Render_F st -> Key_F st -> Int -> Shell st

-- | Group (protected)
sh_gr :: Shell st -> Int

-- | Number of channels
sh_nc :: Shell st -> Int

-- | Number of frames
sh_nf :: Shell st -> Int

-- | Buffer ID
sh_b :: Shell st -> Int

-- | Bus index
sh_ix :: Shell st -> Int

-- | Signal data
sh_data :: Shell st -> [[Double]]
sh_bracket :: Shell st -> Bracket_F st
sh_sc3 :: Shell st -> SC3_F st
sh_render :: Shell st -> Render_F st
sh_key :: Shell st -> Key_F st

-- | Frame delay in ms
sh_delay :: Shell st -> Int
sh_bracket_nil :: Bracket_F st
sh_sc3_nil :: SC3_F st
sh_monitor_bus :: Transport t => Shell st -> t -> IO ()
deinterleave :: Int -> [a] -> [[a]]
sh_std_sc3 :: Transport t => Shell st -> t -> IO (Shell st)
sh_on_close :: UDP -> Shell b -> b -> IO b
sh_keypress_f :: WidgetClass w => w -> IORef st -> UDP -> Shell st -> Event -> IO Bool
sh_update_f :: WidgetClass w => w -> Surface -> IORef st -> UDP -> Shell st -> IO Bool
sc3_fd :: IO UDP
shell :: Shell st -> st -> IO ()
sh_default :: Int -> Render_F st -> Key_F st -> Shell st
